articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Epic Games asks judge to force Apple to approve Fortnite - TechCrunch
articles.description: Epic Games is escalating its efforts to pressure Apple to allow its game Fortnite into its App Store, with a new court filing asking Judge Yvonne Gonzalez
articles.content: Epic Games is escalating its efforts to pressure Apple to allow its game Fortnite into its App Store, with a new court filing asking Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers to require that Apple accept any comp… [+1780 chars]
